channel.title: Ipod on Matt Stine
channel.description: Recent content in Ipod on Matt Stine

item.title: my ipod is on rice
item.description: Let me set the stage for you. I’m driving home happily listening to Ted Neward discuss the merits of Scala on the Javaworld podcast. As I pull into the driveway I see my wife waving frantically in the window. As geek brain struggles to process this, home brain kicks into gear. She needs me in the house now! I jump out of the car and slam the door shut, leaving all of the belongings I typically carry in the house.
